sentences.english: Let us visit workshop, polo homme, OK?
Even so, he did what he could to greet his many friends throughout the world.
sentences.chinese: 但即使這樣，他仍儘可能地向世界各地的友人問安。

sentences.english: The foreign guest picked some music tapes with our help. He was pleased and thanked us a lot.
sentences.chinese: 在我們的幫助下這位外國友人挑了一些音樂磁帶。

sentences.english: Obama! What do you think of Obama, my American friends?
sentences.chinese: 你是怎麼看我們美國的友人奧巴馬的？

sentences.english: I have something very unique to discuss with readers- the spirituality of work.
sentences.chinese: 很少友人談論這個，因此我知道我填補了這個空白。

sentences.english: It is not only loved by local people, but by international friends as well.
sentences.chinese: 它不但被當地人所喜愛，而且連國際友人也非常喜愛。

sentences.english: The death of his friend rived his heart with grief.
sentences.chinese: 友人之死使他非常傷心。

sentences.english: Welcome all guys from TungHai University for sharing everything you would like to show.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎東海友人一起分享一起所參與的人事物。

sentences.english: The men in the trenches stayed down while the enemy shells were exploding.
sentences.chinese: 當友人的炮彈爆炸時，塹壕裏的人坐倒了。

sentences.english: I found again in the heart of a friend.
sentences.chinese: 我發現又深印在一位友人的心。

sentences.english: "CHINDIA" was first created by an Indian friend, Lanmishi.
sentences.chinese: “CHINDIA”是由印度友人蘭密施首創的。

sentences.english: Lecture: Art in Photography, Taipei Fine Arts Museum, 1989.
sentences.chinese: 人觀攝影個展，與友人夫婦，妻，臺北市立美術舘。

sentences.english: After stepping off Nation's entrance, treatment has also brought Chinese tradition doctor of traditional Chinese medicine to the international friend.
sentences.chinese: 走出國門後把中國傳統的中醫療法也帶給了國際友人。

sentences.english: The foreign guest picked some music tapes with our help.
sentences.chinese: 在我們的幫助下這位外國友人挑了一些音樂磁帶。

sentences.english: He cheated his friends into the belief that he was an honest man.
sentences.chinese: 他哄騙友人相信他是個老實人。

sentences.english: After going abroad, I brought the traditional Chinese medicine to the international friends.
sentences.chinese: 走出國門後把中國傳統的中醫療法也帶給了國際友人。

definition: old friend/sb who passed the county level imperial exam (in Ming dynasty)
close friend/pal/(social networking website) friend/CL:個|个[ge4]
to know oneself/to be intimate or close/intimate friend
